short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The magnifying glass shows a zoomed image within its radius, without disturbing the rest of the page.
short.fr: La loupe agrandit une partie de la page, sans affecter le reste du site.
short.zh_CN: 放大镜好似雨伞，说不定什么时候就能用上。
short.zh_TW: 放大鏡好似雨傘，説不定什麽時候就能用上。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply press Alt+Z* to summon the magnifying glass! Then press any key to remove it.

*Ctrl+Z for MAC users by default.

The extension does not require any special permission. It just works~***

***Please note that the extension does not work in New Tab page, Chrome setting page and Chrome Web Store by default, but it will work on any other webpages.***



v.1.0.2 Change-log
+ Added option to specify a compensation factor for OS-level magnification
+ Added option to close the magnifier scope only when ESC key is pressed

v.1.0.1 Change-log
+ Added French and Chinese localizations
+ Enabled anti-aliasing by default
+ Other minor optimization

Icons made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
long.fr:
Simplement appuyez sur Alt+Z* pour utiliser la loupe! Puis appuyez sur n'importe quelle touche pour l'arrêter.

*Ctrl+Z pour les utilisateurs de MAC par défaut.

L'extension ne demande aucune permission spéciale. C'est magnifique!***

***Veuillez noter que la loupe ne fonctionne pas dans la page du nouvel onglet, la page des paramètres et Chrome Web Store par défaut.***



Icons made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
long.zh_CN:
同时按下Alt+Z*即可开启放大镜，之后按下任意键便可关闭。

*MAC默认快捷键为Ctrl+Z

***本扩展程序可以在除新标签页、Chrome设置界面及Chrome应用商店外的任何页面使用***


Icons made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
long.zh_TW:
同時按下Alt+Z*即可開啓放大鏡，之後按下任意鍵便可關閉。

*MAC默認快速鍵為Ctrl+Z

***本擴充功能可以在除新增分頁、Chrome設定界面及Chrome綫上應用程式商店外的任意頁面使用***
